question: You own an old item that you think is valuable and would like to sell. Write a letter to the owner of an antique’s shop.In your letter:explain how you found the shopdescribe the item that you would like to sellsay how much you would like to sell the item for
text: I am writing this to bring your attention to an antic that I have in my possession.

to begin with, let me give the details about how I got to know about your shop. I read an article about your shop in the Sunday Observer last month. In that, they have rated you as  one of the great sellers in our country. So, I thought to contact you first, before selling this item.

The item that I have is an old coin, and I believe this belongs to the 17th century  because it has some symbols which appeared in that era. In addition to this, it's round in shape, and it has a clear gold colour.

I expect to sell this item for around 10 million  because these are very rare to find. Moreover, I have obtained a certificate from the Sri Lankan archaeology society to prove this is not  fake. Anyway, I am open to negotiations, so please let me know about your interest.
I would appreciate your immediate response to this, and I look forward to hearing from you.
